LanguageData.LowFoodAddendum: \nFood of lower preferability may be available
LanguageData.FoodAlert_Decent: \n\nThat is a decent amount of food.
LanguageData.FoodAlert_Poor: \n\nThat is a poor amount of food.
LanguageData.FoodAlert_Solid: \n\nThat is a solid amount of food.
LanguageData.FoodAlert_Ridiculous: \n\nThat is an utterly ridiculous amount of food.
LanguageData.SettingExplanation:
Examples

DesperateOnly: fertilized eggs, ambrosia
RawBad: kibble, unfertilized eggs
RawTasty: milk, berries
MealAwful: nutrient paste meal
MealSimple: simple meal, pemmican
MealFine: fine meal, insect jelly
MealLavish: lavish meal
LanguageData.FA.updatetype.label: Update frequency
LanguageData.FA.typedynamic.label: Dynamic
LanguageData.FA.typedynamic.description: Will update the food-situation based on how many days of food is available. The more days of food is available, the less often the tooltip will update. This is to improve performance in larger colonies.
